title: Improved Tests for Mediation
abstract: arXiv:2403.02144v1 Announce Type: new  Abstract: Testing for a mediation effect is important in many disciplines, but is made difficult - even asymptotically - by the influence of nuisance parameters. Classical tests such as likelihood ratio (LR) and Wald (Sobel) tests have very poor power properties in parts of the parameter space, and many attempts have been made to produce improved tests, with limited success. In this paper we show that augmenting the critical region of the LR test can produce a test with much improved behavior everywhere. In fact, we first show that there exists a test of this type that is (asymptotically) exact for certain test levels $\alpha $, including the common choices $\alpha =.01,.05,.10.$ The critical region of this exact test has some undesirable properties. We go on to show that there is a very simple class of augmented LR critical regions which provides tests that are nearly exact, and avoid the issues inherent in the exact test. translated_abstract: 在许多学科中，测试中介效应是很重要的，但受到干扰参数的影响，即使在渐近情况下也变得困难。传统测试，如似然比（LR）和Wald（Sobel）检验在参数空间的某些部分具有非常糟糕的功率特性，许多尝试已经被为了产生改进的检验，但效果有限。本文中，我们展示了扩展LR测试的临界区域可以产生一个在所有地方都有明显改进行为的测试。事实上，我们首先表明存在一种这种类型的测试，对于某些测试水平$\alpha$（包括常见选择$\alpha =.01,.05,.10$）是（渐近）精确的。这种精确检验的临界区域具有一些不良属性。我们继续展示存在一种非常简单的增广LR临界区域类，提供了几乎精确的测试，并避免了精确测试固有的问题。
tldr: 本文通过扩展LR测试的临界区域，提出了一种改进的中介效应检验方法，可以在所有情况下都有明显改进，避开了传统测试的一些问题。
en_tdlr: This paper proposes an improved test for mediation effects by augmenting the critical region of the LR test, showing better performance in all cases and avoiding some issues of traditional tests.
